qas.question: By what year is solar power expected to become the world's greatest source of electricity?
When is solar power is foreseen to become the largest source of electricity?

context: Solar power is anticipated to become the world's largest source of electricity by <a0_0><a1_0>2050<a1_0/><a0_0/>, with solar photovoltaics and concentrated solar power contributing 16 and 11 percent to the global overall consumption, respectively.
